item.title: @elonmusk: NEWS: As many as 1,200 Tesla vehicles will be in@boringcompany's Vegas Loop when it's done building ...
item.description: NEWS: As many as 1,200 Tesla vehicles will be in@boringcompany's Vegas Loop when it's done building 68 miles of tunnels and 104 stations in the next few years. Boring Co. President Steve Davis: "At that point, the larger capacity@TeslaRobovan will be introduced to the loop system, mainly to be used during large events where several passengers are going to the same destination, such as game and event days at Allegiant Stadium." ‚ÄúThe second you have four (passengers) and you have to start stopping, the best thing you can do is put your smallest vehicle in, which is a car,‚Äù Davis said. ‚ÄúBut if you know people are going to the stadium because of a game, you‚Äôll know an hour before, two hours before, that a lot of people are going to a game or a Sphere show, if you are smart about it, that‚Äôs when you put a high occupancy vehicle in, that‚Äôs when you put the Robovan in.‚Äù via@reviewjournal

item.title: @elonmusk: The left didn‚Äôt care about Iryna Zarutska. The left didn‚Äôt care about Charlie Kirk. The left didn‚Äôt ...
item.description: The left didn‚Äôt care about Iryna Zarutska. The left didn‚Äôt care about Charlie Kirk. The left didn‚Äôt care about Austin Metcalf. The left didn‚Äôt care National Guardsmen got shot in DC. But they burn cities over a woman who tried to kill ICE agents. Let that sink in‚Ä¶

item.title: @elonmusk: NEWS: The FCC has just authorized@SpaceXto deploy and operate up to 15,000 next-gen satellites (up f...
item.description: NEWS: The FCC has just authorized@SpaceXto deploy and operate up to 15,000 next-gen satellites (up from 7,500). "This expansion will enable SpaceX to deliver high-speed, low-latency internet service globally, including enhanced mobile and supplemental coverage from space." The FCC‚Äôs decision allows SpaceX to: ‚Ä¢ Upgrade the Gen2 Starlink satellites with advanced form factors and cutting-edge technology. ‚Ä¢ Operate across Ku-, Ka-, V-, E-, and W-band frequencies, supporting both Fixed Satellite Service (FSS) and Mobile Satellite Service (MSS). ‚Ä¢ Waive obsolete requirements that prevented overlapping beam coverage and enhanced capacity. ‚Ä¢ Add new orbital shells at altitudes ranging from 340 km to 485 km, optimizing coverage and performance. ‚Ä¢ Provide direct-to-cell connectivity outside the United States and supplemental coverage within the U.S., paving the way for next-generation mobile services.

item.title: @elonmusk: The income tax was supposed to be temporary to fund World War I. Now it funds Somali fraud. Ending t...
item.description: The income tax was supposed to be temporary to fund World War I. Now it funds Somali fraud. Ending the income tax would cement Donald Trump as the greatest President in American history.
